articles.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: Sensex falls 180 pts, Nifty below 19,350; FMCG, IT, metal drag - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Bajaj Finserv, ONGC, Asian Paints, Bajaj Finance and BPCL are among the top gainers on the Nifty, while losers are IndusInd Bank, L&T, Adani Enterprises, Dr Reddy's Laboratories and Adani Ports. All the sectoral i…
articles.content: Kfin Tech shares were up 13.41 percent, at Rs 436, at 10.37 am on August 25 after Jefferies initiated a 'buy' rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 500. The foreign brokerage firm said KFin i… [+980 chars]
